affirmations.description: You got this!
Today is the day for action.
Don't be afraid to fail.
Practice makes progress!
Meet yourself where you are at.
Be willing to believe in yourself.
Use obstacles to motivate your learning & growth.
You are in the right place at the right time, doing the right thing.
Courage starts with showing up and letting ourselves be seen.
You have permission to be new at something!
You are a strong and capable person.
Trust yourself to make good decisions.
You have earned your seat at the table.
You do not have to be perfect to be effective.
Your opinion holds weight and has value to others.
You are prepared to tackle any obstacle that comes your way.
Asking for help is a sign of self-respect and self-awareness.
You are growing and you are going at your own pace.
You are worthy of investing in yourself.
You have come farther than you would have ever thought possible, and you're learning along the way.
